hr.fer.zemris.java.graphics.raster

Class BWRasterMem

  • java.lang.Object
    • hr.fer.zemris.java.graphics.raster.BWRasterMem
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    BWRaster

    public class BWRasterMem
extends java.lang.Object
implements BWRaster
    Raster representation that holds the raster in it's memory.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Juraj Pejnovic

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void clear()
      Clears the entire raster, turning all pixels off.

      Checks whether the requested pixel is turned on.
      void turnOff(int x, int y)
      Turns the requested pixel off.
      void turnOn(int x, int y)
